programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock the Phone: Is She Still Talking to her One-Night Stand?

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: Are You My Brother & Sister?

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: To See Your Grandson...Stop Bullying Me

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom Calls Me Pure Evil; Before We Get Married, Is He My Son?
programme.desc: Mia confronts her mother, Gwennie, regarding the 17 years of abuse she's endured; Caleb questions whether he's the father of his fiancée Mahogany's child after seeing footage of another man driving his car with Mahogany.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: "I'm Here for the Truth"; My BFF Bullies Me
programme.desc: Trupania says he's fed up with his wife's sneaky behavior, while she calls him an insecure man; Netta says her best friend, Taty, insults her about her body and the way she dresses, while Taty claims she's just offering her tough love.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: You're Letting A Man Come Between Us
programme.desc: On Karamo, Zee says the relationship with her bestie, Bree, has been shattered. Zee blames Bree’s boyfriend, Daquan, for all the dissension in their friendship. Both Daquan and Bree claim that Zee has betrayed them and is not a loyal friend.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Help, My 23-Year-Old Bestie Is Drinking Too Much/ Unlock The Phone: Did You Cheat On My Birthday?
programme.desc: Shelby and Brandi are both concerned about their friend Manny’s excessive drinking.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I'm 17, Are You My Daddy?
programme.desc: Keyonna was just 15 years young when she had her daughter, and she believes Rashard is the father.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Help My Out of Control 14-Year-Old Sister!
programme.desc: Eric is concerned about his 14-year-old sister and believes she’s headed down a path of self-destruction.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: We Both Have a Son by You!; DNA Mystery: He Can't Be Mine!
programme.desc: Sheldon has gone to extraordinary efforts to keep his baby mamas apart; Mac says his girlfriend drugged him and brought random men to their house for sex, and it raises concerns over the paternity of her 11-month-old daughter.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Fiance Cheating When He Says He's at Church?
programme.desc: Charisse thinks her fiancé Deon cheated with her best friend Shante. Then Jessica believes her child’s dad Ronald slept with her cousin. Jennifer wants a lie detector test to find out if her boyfriend had sex with another women.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept With My Husband's Nephew…Who's the Dad?
programme.desc: These women are here to find out once and for all who the fathers of their children really are. But these men won't step up and take responsibility until they know for sure that the kids belong to them.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You're 14…Stop Bragging About Sex and Violence!
programme.desc: Kimberly is a teen mother who refuses to take care of her own baby. Jurina has been pregnant multiple times and doesn't think she needs to change. Can Maury's team of experts help these girls change their lives for the better?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You're 47 ... I Won't Let You Date My Teen Son
programme.desc: These the love these couples share span decades, but it's that same love that threatens to tear their families apart . What will happen when the families of these couples confront them about their older/younger relationships?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Choose One ... Take the Test or Reveal Your Sex Secrets!
programme.desc: Sean swears that her husband is cheating! Then, did Stuart backstab Alexandra by cheating with prostitutes? Plus Michelle caught Cedric cheating online by posing as another woman in a chat room.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Stop Sleeping With My Son...He's Half Your Age!
programme.desc: Candice is worried her fiance might be cheating with her mother. Then, Sandra won't accept that her son wants to marry an older woman. Plus, Jimmy says that his kids are terrified that a 24 year old woman will become their new mother.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Will The DNA Test Prove I Have 10 Kids?
programme.desc: Karissa confronts Terry about paternity, seeking Maury's test. Tiffany claims Brian fathered her three kids, pushing for DNA proof.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Saw the Video...You Cheated With a Stripper!
programme.desc: Maury’s guests are sick and tired of their men cheating on them. Can Maury find out the truth and will these relationships survive? Tune in today!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Cheated with my Twin Brother...is he Our Baby's Dad?
programme.desc: SP is back on the show and his brother denies Tiffany’s baby. They claim the father is her 80 year old co-worker! Then, Ally is sure that Anna’s mother put a voodoo curse on him! The results are in on the next Maury!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I've Tested 8 Men … I Think Your Husband Is The Father!
programme.desc: Mothers return after multiple appearances to test more men in order to find out once and for all who the fathers of their children are.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept With 100 Men! Who's My Baby's Father?
programme.desc: Veronica says Marcus denies her 2 month old daughter because his mother says he can't have kids. Then, Randy left Amy when she was 4 1/2 months pregnant with their child for another woman.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Doggie Damage
programme.desc: Marie Lavin says she was walking her dog when the defendant’s pit bull got loose and mauled her dog. Now, five months later, she’s having on heck of a time getting him to pay the vet bills and is suing for $1,848. The defendant, Peter Martin Connolly, says the plaintiff’s dog was the aggressor, came over to his fence, and started attacking his dog which was on his property. His dog, a bulldog, not a pit bull, was just defending himself in his own yard. He’s accused of doing some doggie damage.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Ex Spending Spree
programme.desc: Llewellyn Clark sues ex-girlfriend Tyronica Munn for $1,400, claiming she stole it after a fight. Tyronica says she spent it on a hotel, champagne, and a massage, asserting the money was owed since Llewellyn freeloaded in her apartment.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Neighbors at War
programme.desc: Viktoriya claims her neighbor Mario's dog damaged her $730 coat by ripping its sleeve. She’s suing for the cost, calling him irresponsible. Mario counters, alleging Viktoriya taunted his dog and provoked the incident.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Doggie Paternity Disaster
programme.desc: Barbara claims Sandra reneged on a deal to exchange a show dog for a female puppy from a litter, suing for $3,000. Sandra argues no puppy was promised, as her dog wasn’t in heat.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Hospital Hook Up
programme.desc: After moving in together, Mackie is suing Joel for unlawfully locking her out.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Sketchy Boyfriend / Sketchy Loan
programme.desc: LaToya wants her ex-boyfriend to pay her back for the rental car after finding out he cheated on her.

programme.title: Karamo

programme.desc: Josh believes that his fiancée, Jessica entertains men while he’s away on business.
